name: Sodium perchlorate
desc: Sodium perchlorate is the inorganic compound with the chemical formula NaClO4. It is the most soluble of the common perchlorate salts. It is a white crystalline, hygroscopic solid that is highly soluble in water and in alcohol. It usually comes as the monohydrate, which has a rhombic crystal system.
Other names:
Sodium chlorate(VII)
Sodium hyperchlorate
Perchloric acid, sodium salt
